page.title: 11BROOK FARM 4
page.content: {FARM MACHINERY} BROOK FARM OWNS ALL THE NORMAL FARM EQUIPMENT SUCH AS A TRACTOR,A PLOUGH ETC.HE ALSO HAS AN AEROPLANE AND A HELICOPTER.NOT LONG AGO HE AND ANOTHER ELEVEN FARMERS BOUGHT A HARVESTER BETWEEN THEM FOR Â£65,000.THESE TWELVE FARMERS FORM A CO_OPERATION AND HELP EACH OTHER.{ {CHEMICALS} MR. WRIGHT ,LIKE MOST, USES WEED KILLERS,FUNGICIDES AND INSECTICIDE ALTOGETHER HE USES ABOUT 500 DIFFERENT CHEMICALS ON HIS CROPS ALL OF WHICH ARE DEGRADABLE IN ROUGHLY 48 HOURS. {GREAT BENTLEY.} GRT BENTLEY,WHERE THE FARM IS SITUATED,IS THE DRIEST PLACE IN THE BRITISH ISLES.SO MR.WRIGHT HAS MADE RESERVOIRS SO THAT HE HAS ENOUGH WATER FOR THE SUMMER WHEN THERE MAY BE NO RAIN FOR DAYS.
